home.title: Home — Ethnos_APP
home.description: Ethnos Bibliography homepage featuring updates, featured journals, and quick access to anthropology and sociology data.
home.keywords: bibliography, anthropology, sociology, academic journals, open catalog, Ethnos

search.title: Search — Ethnos_APP
search.description: Advanced search form to filter works by title, author, journal, subject, year, type, and language.
search.keywords: advanced search, anthropology, sociology, scholarly query, Ethnos

results.title: Results — Ethnos_APP
results.description: Legacy search redirect to maintain access to previous result links within Ethnos.
results.keywords: legacy results, search redirect, bibliography routing, Ethnos

venues.title: Journals — Ethnos_APP
venues.description: Directory of academic journals with coverage data, metrics, and publisher context for anthropology and sociology.
venues.keywords: journals, anthropology, sociology, Scopus metrics, Open Access, Ethnos

venuesDetail.title: Journal Details — Ethnos_APP
venuesDetail.description: Detailed journal profile featuring SJR, SNIP, and CiteScore metrics, identifiers, and editorial description.
venuesDetail.keywords: journal metrics, SJR, SNIP, CiteScore, anthropology, sociology

works.title: Works — Ethnos_APP
works.description: Catalog of indexed works and bibliographic curation within Ethnos Bibliography.

workDetail.description: Full bibliographic record featuring DOI, authors, references, citations, and export tools.
workDetail.keywords: metadata, DOI, anthropology, sociology, citations, Open Access

searchResults.description: Search result list displaying metadata, applied filters, and pagination.
searchResults.keywords: search results, anthropology, sociology, bibliographic research

searchSphinx.title: Search — Sphinx — Ethnos_APP
searchSphinx.description: Sphinx-powered search engine focused on relevance, full-text queries, and faceted exploration.
